title: Champion Men's Pants, Lightweight Lounge, Jersey Knit Casual Pants for Men (Reg. or Big & Tall)
description: THE FIT - Standard-fit men's lounge pants with a 31.5" inseam. Elastic waistband with drawcord adjusts for a fit that feels good.
THE FEEL - Comfortable men’s lightweight pants made from soft 6.1 oz. cotton or a cotton blend that’s soft on the skin.
THE LOOK - Cinched hem tailors the look for gym-to-lounge versatility.
POCKETS - Two side pockets keep your essentials close.
SPOT THE C - These men’s pants feature the iconic C logo at the hip.
Note: C logo patch color may vary from image.
Champion Men'S Pants, Lightweight Lounge, Jersey Knit Casual Pants For Men (Reg. Or Big & Tall)
